name: 99 Minutos, Inc.
description: Operator of an e-commerce logistics platform intended to simplify the delivery burden of online retail orders. The company specializes in delivering online shopping products with real-time global positioning system (GPS) tracking and efficient routing within Mexico, Chile, Perú, and Colombia, enabling e-commerce companies to deliver the product at a low cost.
one_liner: Operator of an e-commerce logistics platform intended to simplify the delivery burden of online retail orders. The company specializes in delivering online shopping products with real-time global positioning system (GPS) tracking and efficient routing within Mexico, Chile, Perú, and Colombia, enabling e-commerce companies to deliver the product at a low cost.

name: APX Solutions Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a cloud freight consolidator platform intended to optimize business operations. The company's platform specializes in offering services including admin control, order management, shipment processing, dispatch management, and route optimization, enabling businesses to automate manual tasks and improve supply chain efficiency and profitability.
one_liner: Operator of a cloud freight consolidator platform intended to optimize business operations. The company's platform specializes in offering services including admin control, order management, shipment processing, dispatch management, and route optimization, enabling businesses to automate manual tasks and improve supply chain efficiency and profitability.

name: JCDT Inc
description: Developer of universal retrieval engine designed to help businesses connect external data sources to their large language models (LLM). The company's system connects external data to vector databases, enabling clients to ingest unstructured data wherever it is stored to enhance capabilities and insights for businesses using large language models.
one_liner: Developer of universal retrieval engine designed to help businesses connect external data sources to their large language models (LLM). The company's system connects external data to vector databases, enabling clients to ingest unstructured data wherever it is stored to enhance capabilities and insights for businesses using large language models.

name: Cargobase Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a SaaS-based logistics platform designed to automate all procurement and freight management processes between enterprise shippers and logistics providers. The company's platform helps enterprise shippers to reduce logistics spending and save time with quoting, booking, management, and analysis of on-demand air, ocean, parcel, rail, and road shipments from their private pool of logistics providers, enabling clients to manage on-demand freight effectively.
one_liner: Developer of a SaaS-based logistics platform designed to automate all procurement and freight management processes between enterprise shippers and logistics providers. The company's platform helps enterprise shippers to reduce logistics spending and save time with quoting, booking, management, and analysis of on-demand air, ocean, parcel, rail, and road shipments from their private pool of logistics providers, enabling clients to manage on-demand freight effectively.

name: Edfa3ly LLC
description: Developer of an automated personal shopping platform designed to help buy items from online stores. The company's platform offers shopping services along with payments to merchants abroad, international shipping, customs clearance and last-mile delivery, enabling customers to shop without country barriers.
one_liner: Developer of an automated personal shopping platform designed to help buy items from online stores. The company's platform offers shopping services along with payments to merchants abroad, international shipping, customs clearance and last-mile delivery, enabling customers to shop without country barriers.

name: EIGHTY 6 HOLDING LIMITED
description: Developer of an online procurement tool intended to bridge the gap between restaurants and suppliers by making ordering and fulfillment hassle-free. The company's platform allows the buyer to review, place orders, and track orders on the go allowing the vendors to aggregate, promote, and communicate with several buyers at the touch of a button, enabling restaurants to streamline and facilitate the entire procurement process by getting access to a procurement app and communication channel.
one_liner: Developer of an online procurement tool intended to bridge the gap between restaurants and suppliers by making ordering and fulfillment hassle-free. The company's platform allows the buyer to review, place orders, and track orders on the go allowing the vendors to aggregate, promote, and communicate with several buyers at the touch of a button, enabling restaurants to streamline and facilitate the entire procurement process by getting access to a procurement app and communication channel.

name: Enhance Holdings Ltd
description: Provider of business development services intended to build vertical marketplaces. The company's services include building businesses from the ground up, with the local market and consumers' needs in mind, and introducing mature models invested in by strategic global venture capital partners, enabling entrepreneurs from the Middle East and Africa to build mobile-enabled businesses.

The company's services include building businesses from the ground up, with the local market and consumers' needs in mind, and introducing mature models invested in by strategic global venture capital partners, enabling entrepreneurs from the Middle East and Africa to build mobile-enabled businesses.

name: Eonpass Inc
description: Stop Counterfeits at scale for enterprises
one_liner: Stop Counterfeits at scale for enterprises

name: KokkanLogis Co.,Ltd.
description: Operator of Primo, an AI-powered freight transportation brokerage platform that seamlessly connects carriers and shippers while offering additional value-added services like electronic billing and freight control.
one_liner: Operator of Primo, an AI-powered freight transportation brokerage platform that seamlessly connects carriers and shippers while offering additional value-added services like electronic billing and freight control.

name: MIENVIO DE MEXICO S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Developer of a multi-carrier shipping platform designed to manage logistics operations. The company's platform offers access to official accounts from the carriers, aggregates prices for multiple courier services and allows customers to compare and book courier services as well as provides collection services from home, and also offers functionalities like shipment tracking and invoice creation, enabling small businesses and independent people to ship their parcels more efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of a multi-carrier shipping platform designed to manage logistics operations. The company's platform offers access to official accounts from the carriers, aggregates prices for multiple courier services and allows customers to compare and book courier services as well as provides collection services from home, and also offers functionalities like shipment tracking and invoice creation, enabling small businesses and independent people to ship their parcels more efficiently.

name: MightyFly, Inc.
description: Provider of logistics and supply chain services intended to serve medical, spare parts, mining, defense, remote and oil and gas industries. The company connects remote locations together with long-range and heavy cargo aircraft, as well as express, customized aerial drone delivery services and provides rapid and efficient package transport, enabling clients with expedited deliveries that are cheaper and faster.

The company connects remote locations together with long-range and heavy cargo aircraft, as well as express, customized aerial drone delivery services and provides rapid and efficient package transport, enabling clients with expedited deliveries that are cheaper and faster.

name: MILE SOLUTIONS HOLDING LTD
description: Provider of logistics platform intended to revolutionize logistics from the first to the last mile that makes enterprise Tech Stack the bedrock for fleet operators. The company's seamlessly integrated logistics and commerce platform digitally orchestrates the transfiguration of intricate operations from fleet and warehouse management to fulfilment storage, merchant oversight, and marketplace commerce, thereby empowering enterprises to elevate their operations to unprecedented levels of efficiency and productivity.

name: Movel AI Pte Ltd
description: Operator of a robotic deployment software solution company intended to simplify the deployment and usage of robots for both hardware companies and end users. The company's platform helps to deploy robots better in a sleek, accurate, and user-friendly manner with advanced deployment solutions to cut down on deployment time and cost, thereby enabling users to get robots up and running quickly, efficiently, and with minimal training.

The company's platform helps to deploy robots better in a sleek, accurate, and user-friendly manner with advanced deployment solutions to cut down on deployment time and cost, thereby enabling users to get robots up and running quickly, efficiently, and with minimal training.

name: My BOX Co., Ltd.
description: Provider of storage services intended to help people to keep their important goods safely. The company's storage services offers containers, hanger boxes, documents boxes and other storage facilities and also provides free shipping and pickup services, enabling individuals to keep their goods with full safety.
one_liner: Provider of storage services intended to help people to keep their important goods safely. name: NEO TECH MOBILITY HOLDINGS LIMITED
description: Neo Mobility offers delivery solutions and integrated electric fleet offerings to delivery and taxi mobility companies and drivers.
one_liner: Neo Mobility offers delivery solutions and integrated electric fleet offerings to delivery and taxi mobility companies and drivers.

name: NITROS HOLDING LIMITED
description: Developer of shipping software designed to manage and ship orders. The company's platform specializes in multi-carrier shipping management operations in one place to set up products and order delivery, enabling the online retailer to create and print shipping labels, automatically update customers and connect to all shipping carriers.
one_liner: Developer of shipping software designed to manage and ship orders. The company's platform specializes in multi-carrier shipping management operations in one place to set up products and order delivery, enabling the online retailer to create and print shipping labels, automatically update customers and connect to all shipping carriers.

name: OTO Global, Inc.
description: Developer of shipping gateway platform designed to speed up deliveries and bring improvements in the retail sector. The company's platform automates and streamlines all shipping operations by combining an order management system (OMS), warehouse management system (WMS), last-mile management system (LMS), and many others, it empowers companies of all sizes to ship, manage, track, return & analyze all their online & offline orders with shipping carriers from a consolidated dashboard, enabling clients to ship faster, cheaper and better, but saving time and operational costs.
one_liner: Developer of shipping gateway platform designed to speed up deliveries and bring improvements in the retail sector. The company's platform automates and streamlines all shipping operations by combining an order management system (OMS), warehouse management system (WMS), last-mile management system (LMS), and many others, it empowers companies of all sizes to ship, manage, track, return & analyze all their online & offline orders with shipping carriers from a consolidated dashboard, enabling clients to ship faster, cheaper and better, but saving time and operational costs.

name: Caarry Solutions Inc.
description: Operator of a logistics technology platform intended to build tools to connect e-commerce businesses with all kinds of logistics providers. The company's platform offers services such as application programming interface delivery, application programming interface routes and application programming interface pickups, enabling businesses to connect with multiple delivery fleets that expand their coverage and reduce logistics expenses.

The company's platform offers services such as application programming interface delivery, application programming interface routes and application programming interface pickups, enabling businesses to connect with multiple delivery fleets that expand their coverage and reduce logistics expenses.

name: Quickshipper Inc.
description: Developer of a fleet management platform designed to assist businesses in managing their deliveries efficiently. The company's platform helps businesses boost their fleet productivity by providing necessary tools for daily operations as well as offering optimal roots to deliver the products, enabling shopping businesses to enhance their productivity.
one_liner: Developer of a fleet management platform designed to assist businesses in managing their deliveries efficiently. name: PT Makmur Sejahtera Organik
description: Provider of a cold chain delivery service intended to deliver fresh food and frozen food overnight delivery using a motorcycle freezer box. The company's logistics system installs a temperature-controlled storage box on motorcycles for shipping fresh and frozen products, enabling clients to deliver at the right temperature.
one_liner: Provider of a cold chain delivery service intended to deliver fresh food and frozen food overnight delivery using a motorcycle freezer box. name: Ruedata, Inc.
description: Developer of fleet management software designed to manage and optimize the savings of the tires. The company's software uses data analysis technology and automated learning algorithms to offer maintenance, compliance planning, and abnormal wear and cost overrun data, enabling clients to increase the profitability of their transport fleet by having updated information online.

name: Shuttle Central Inc.
description: Operator of an online mobility and transportation platform intended to help travel companies boost revenue by offering add-ons to their customers starting with airport rides. The company's platform connects local transportation services into one place and provides them with the necessary technology, enabling travelers to move easily around the world.

name: Spaceship Holding Limited
description: Spaceship powers global e-commerce with one platform for shipping and fulfillment.
one_liner: Spaceship powers global e-commerce with one platform for shipping and fulfillment.

name: SPIDER FLEET, S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Provider of a fleet management system created to evaluate driving performance and control fuel consumption. The company's system offers total monitoring of operator management behaviors, real-time geolocation of vehicles, intelligent routes and itineraries tracking, and fuel control and maintenance, enabling customers to radically improve the management of commercial and private vehicle fleets.

The company's system offers total monitoring of operator management behaviors, real-time geolocation of vehicles, intelligent routes and itineraries tracking, and fuel control and maintenance, enabling customers to radically improve the management of commercial and private vehicle fleets.

name: Veluga Brewery Inc.
description: Provider of beverage subscription services intended to serve handcrafted beer. The company's services include craft beer curation and subscription where members are delivered a themed box of hand-selected craft beers and food pairings every month, enabling members to enjoy their beverage drinks.
one_liner: Provider of beverage subscription services intended to serve handcrafted beer. name: YETCARGO, S.A.P.I. de C.V
description: Developer of a logistics platform designed to connect carriers with cargo owners. The company provides real-time tracking of cargo and claims to have a portfolio of reliable carriers, enabling businesses in product shipment and transportation by connecting and dealing with air and marine logistics service providers.
